glsa.title: Streamripper: Multiple remote buffer overflows
glsa.synopsis: Streamripper is vulnerable to multiple remote buffer overflows, leading to the execution of arbitrary code.

background.p: Streamripper extracts and records individual MP3 file tracks from SHOUTcast streams.

description.p: Ulf Harnhammar, from the Debian Security Audit Project, has found that Streamripper is vulnerable to multiple stack based buffer overflows caused by improper bounds checking when processing malformed HTTP headers.

impact.p: By enticing a user to connect to a malicious server, an attacker could execute arbitrary code with the permissions of the user running Streamripper

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.
